name: Over The Net Beach Volleyball
description:
Over 1 million downloads!!! Thanks! Original Amiga graphics mode!
Watch the tutorial if you've difficult to play

Reviews:
- Gamesurf: 7/10
- iPhoneItalia: 8/10
- iPhoner: 7/10

"Over The Net Beach Volley” is the arcade video-game of the most played summer game in all the beaches of the world.
You'll be able to take part in enjoyable and frantic tournaments on the most famous beaches, Miami, Barcelona, Dubai, Montecarlo and many others.

Main functionalities:

- "Practice" mode: gives you the possibility of a not-limited training, without points and interruptions
- "Single game" mode: you can choose your own team among 11 possibilities and one out of 4 beaches.
- "World tour": after you have chosen your team, you start a world competition in 8 different beaches playing with stronger and stronger teams.
- Amiga "vintage" mode!

Main game characteristics:
- Variable number of sets (1-3-5)
- "Amiga vintage 1989" play option
- Player control using a virtual pad
- Button for jumps and blocks
- Button for save, bump, overhand pass, dig
- 2 different kinds of serve.: normal or "jump serve"
- Spike: during the jump, spikes are performed by swiping your finger. Your movement determines the strength and direction of the ball. Extremely strong attacks may disorienting the adversary when hit thus increasing the spectacularity of the actions.
- Play mate and adversary players are characterized by advanced artificial intelligence

Look at the tutorial in the support page!
